name: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Development
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of AWS delivery process, monitoring, metrics, logging, security, validation and scalability.

name: Aerospace Engineering
description: Multi-choice test that measures the conceptual knowledge of aerodynamics, aircraft systems and instrumentation, flight dynamics, space dynamics and avionics.

name: Agile Software Development
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of agile methodology, scrum, feature driven software development, incremental and iterative development and processes involved in agile software development.

name: Android Development
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of UI components for an Android device, services and alerts, animation and media apps, application components, security and testing.

name: AngularJS
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of AngularJS architecture, forms, directives, filters, controllers, routing and testing.

name: Apache Kafka
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of Apache Kafka architecture, components, clusters, performance tuning and advanced operations.

name: ASP.NET 4.5
description: The ASP.NET 4.5 test measures knowledge of programming in the ASP.NET environment. Designed for experienced developers, but an average performer in this role should pass this test. This test includes the following topics: .NET Framework, Client-Side Programming, Data Access, Enhanced Runtime Features, Portals, Services and Mobile, Security, Troubleshooting and Optimization, Web Applications, and Web Forms.

name: Automata-SQL
description: A simulated query writing test that measures the ability to write SQL queries to perform DDL, DML and DCL tasks.

name: Blockchain Development
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of blockchain fundamentals, smart contracts, consensus algorithms, Ethereum, and decentralized application development.

name: Data Engineering
description: Multi-choice test that measures the understanding of ETL pipelines, data warehousing, big data frameworks, and database technologies.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Multi-choice test that evaluates knowledge in supervised and unsupervised learning, model evaluation, feature engineering, and ML workflows.

name: Docker & Containerization
description: Multi-choice test that assesses the knowledge of Docker architecture, containers, Dockerfiles, orchestration with Docker Compose, and registry usage.

name: Kubernetes
description: Multi-choice test that measures knowledge of Kubernetes architecture, deployments, services, pod management, volumes, and networking.

name: DevOps Practices
description: Multi-choice test that evaluates understanding of CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, monitoring, and automation tools.

name: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of common cyber threats, secure coding, network security protocols, and data protection techniques.

name: Numerical Reasoning
description: Timed test that measures the ability to interpret, analyze and draw conclusions from numerical data.

name: Situational Judgement for Managers
description: Test that assesses judgment in real-world workplace scenarios involving team management, decision making and conflict resolution.

name: Leadership Competency
description: Evaluates competencies in strategic thinking, influence, and decision-making capabilities essential for leadership roles.

name: 360 Degree Feedback
description: A feedback-based assessment designed to evaluate an individual's behavior and skills as perceived by others in the workplace.

name: In-Basket Exercise
description: Simulates a managerial in-basket with tasks and memos to assess planning, prioritization, and decision-making skills.

name: Cognitive Ability Simulation
description: A simulation test that evaluates problem-solving, pattern recognition, and logical reasoning under timed conditions.

name: Behavioral Personality Inventory
description: Personality test that explores preferences, motivations, and behavioral tendencies in the workplace.

name: Verbal Reasoning
description: Evaluates the ability to read and interpret written information and draw logical conclusions.

name: Emotional Intelligence
description: Measures the ability to recognize, understand, and manage emotions in oneself and others.
